# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Carbon and Nitrogen Analyzer

## Notice Details

* **RFx Reference**: WS3735405347-3735682695
* **Last modification date**: December 21, 2022
* **Publication date**: November 30, 2022
* **Closing date**: January 10, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Contract start and end dates**: None/2023-04-30

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire, deliver, install, train, and provide after-sales service for a Carbon and Nitrogen Analyzer for the Research and Development Center located in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.

## Evaluation and Award Criteria

* Evaluation: Lowest Price (Lowest Price Policy)

## Contract Award Requirements

* The contractor shall provide all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing date.
* Bids submitted after the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Renee-Ann Therien
* **Job Title**: Therien, Renee-Ann (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL and Attachment

* The RFP notice and related documents are available on the following website: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14775008?extsite=MTQ3NzUwMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* No additional attachment is provided.

## Disclaimer

Please note that the contract may be awarded to multiple responders. It is the bidder's responsibility to familiarize themselves with this solicitation and to confirm that they have submitted all required information by the designated closing date.
